banner_details:
This banner showcases a refined product advertisement layout, ideal for jewelry promotions. The design follows a symmetrical split with the left side focused on textual details and the right on product imagery. The background has a soft radial gradient with delicate decorative lines and circles in complementary pastel pink tones. The composition features bold top headlines (`heading_1` and `heading_2`) using a modern sans-serif font in rose pink, drawing immediate attention. A serif subheading (`subheading`) and description text (`description`) follow, bringing elegance. Below, key features (`features`) are presented as bullet points. The price (`price`) is prominently styled in pink with a tech-like font. A call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) in bold pink invites engagement. The banner closes with a soft tagline (`tagline`). On the right, a high-quality image (`product_image`) of rose gold earrings enhances visual appeal.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Cream/Blush (#FFF5F5)
- Light Peach Pink (#FFE4E4)
- Rose Pink (#D87093)
- Charcoal Gray (#333333)
- Neutral Gray (#666666)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings with a charming rose gold and crystal theme. The dominant color is a soft **rose gold (#F4A7B9)** that outlines the floral motifs and petal shapes, exuding sophistication and warmth. This is tastefully blended with brilliant **crystal white (#FFFFFF)** and **diamond silver (#E5E5E5)** hues representing the sparkling stones. The rose gold provides a warm contrast to the cool brilliance of the crystals, highlighting their shine. The delicate mix of shimmering and matte finishes ensures visual depth. A complementary color palette for an advertisement banner could include **blush pink (#FADADD)** and **light peach (#FFE5E0)** to maintain elegance and femininity.
